reviews.comment: Authentic Lanzhou beef noodles are delicious, and I'm so happy to have a bowl on a cold day.

Tasty but not amazing. I thought it was similar to Guizhou's beef noodles, and I thought I had the taste of Guizhou. However, the meat in Lanzhou beef noodles is really low, and when I ate beef noodles in Zunyi, I could still eat a few pieces of meat, but the meat in Lanzhou noodles is really gone after a quick glance. I think the reason why it tastes so good to people outside of Gansu province is that the soup base is made from beef bones, after all the noodles I've eaten in other provinces are mostly just a spoonful of boiled water. If the beef noodle soup is made from beef bones, it will cost you two yuan more than in other restaurants.

I think the essence of Lanzhou beef noodle is the pot of soup, the bone broth is so rich and seemingly light, but it is actually very tasty.After get up in the morning, having the soup and noodles, simple and easy, then your body is warm, go to work full of energy!
This steaming bowl of Lanzhou beef noodles with thinly sliced white radishes in the broth, topped with a sprinkling of cilantro and a drizzle of chili oil. Delicious!
Because I don't eat beef, I ate Lanzhou beef noodles without beef. It was so good that I had all the soup, but I felt a little guilty because the soup was made from beef, but I don't eat beef!

This noodle restaurant was my go-to for beef noodles in Guangzhou, and it's where my high school alumni would meet for noodles and barbecue. This is basically the place to eat all those missed meals in Lanzhou at once!
Yesterday, I ate a spicy chicken noodle dish that was so spicy it made my stomach hurt in my sleep, and this afternoon I ate a bowl and a half of dry rice with a vengeance.
Winter's first bowl of spicy chicken noodles, so spicy, so refreshing, so delicious!

I think the essence of Lanzhou beef noodle is the pot of soup, the bone broth is so rich and seemingly light, but it is actually very tasty.After get up in the morning, having the soup and noodles, simple and easy, then your body is warm, go to work full of energy!
